mapper.select: SELECT schedule_no scheduleNo, emp_no empNo, title, content, type, start_datetime startDatetime, end_datetime endDatetime FROM schedule WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}

SELECT r.rsv_no rsvNo, r.room_no roomNo, r.emp_no empNo, r.rsv_date rsvDate, r.start_datetime startDatetime, r.end_datetime endDatetime, r.`type` type, r.rsv_state rsvState, e.dpt_no dptNo, e.emp_name empName FROM room_rsv r INNER JOIN emp e ON r.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE e.dpt_no = #{dptNo}

SELECT h.start_date startDate, h.end_date endDate, h.emergency_contact contact, e.emp_name name FROM day_off_history h INNER JOIN emp e ON h.emp_no = h.emp_no WHERE e.dpt_no = #{dptNo} AND h.cancel_YN = 'N'

SELECT e.emp_name name, b.business_trip_destination destination, b.start_date startDate, b.end_date endDate, b.emergency_contact contact FROM business_trip_history b LEFT JOIN emp e ON b.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE e.dpt_no = #{dptNo} AND b.cancle_YN = 'N'
